rules.description: SQL syntax error in the query
rules.suggestion: Review the SQL query for syntax errors

rules.description: Referenced table does not exist in the database
rules.suggestion: Create the table or check the table name for typos

rules.description: Referenced column does not exist in the table
rules.suggestion: Add the column to the table or check the column name for typos

rules.description: Attempted to insert a duplicate value into a column with a unique constraint
rules.suggestion: Check for existing records before inserting or update the existing record instead

rules.description: Foreign key constraint violation in the database operation
rules.suggestion: Ensure the referenced record exists in the parent table before operating on the child table

rules.pattern: psycopg2.errors.UniqueViolation: duplicate key value violates unique constraint "([^"]+)"
rules.description: Attempted to insert a duplicate value into a column with a unique constraint in PostgreSQL
rules.suggestion: Check for existing records before inserting or update the existing record instead

rules.description: Attempted to insert a duplicate value into a column with a unique constraint in MySQL
rules.suggestion: Check for existing records before inserting or update the existing record instead
